de.cellular.lib.lightlib.ui.view.gallery
Class LLGallery

java.lang.Object
  RelativeLayout
      de.cellular.lib.lightlib.ui.view.gallery.LLGallery
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILLGallery, LLSlideView.OnItemClickListener, LLSlideView.OnItemScrolledListener, LLSlideView.OnItemScrollListener
public class LLGallery
extends RelativeLayout
implements LLSlideView.OnItemClickListener, LLSlideView.OnItemScrolledListener, LLSlideView.OnItemScrollListener, ILLGallery

A smooth gallery with an indicator, left-right button controlling, left-right arrow controlling, and comment text under or upon.

Weakness of current versions

  • LLGallery can only show the items whose height is larger than width.
  • Data source should have equal width and height.

    • Version:
    1.0.4

  • Fixed bug that the gallary can not be installed on fragment.
    • , 1.0.3

  • Pass downloaded bitmaps to client are available in listeners

    • , 1.0.2 Deprecated setImagesByWidth(java.util.List, int) replaced with setImages(List, int) and fixed bug in it.

  • Add

    • changeThisViewLayoutAfterAddingItems(int, int)

    setImages(List, int)

    Moved most of methods into the interface ILLGallery., 1.0.1 In this version it can append item.

  • Add
    • appendImage(Bitmap)

    appendImage(Bitmap, int, String)

    appendImage(Bitmap, int, int)

    setCommentsView(View,CommentPosition)

    Comments are now saved in a list.

    , 1.0

  • just a beginning
    • Author:
    Chris Xinyue Zhao

                          java.util.List<Bitmap> _bitmaps)
    Description copied from interface: LLSlideView.OnItemClickListener
    User clicked view.

    It could be < 0, because user could click view while item was moving.

    Please check before handling event.

    onItemScroll

    public void onItemScroll(int _location,
                         java.util.List<Bitmap> _bitmaps)
    Description copied from interface: LLSlideView.OnItemScrollListener
    Items're moving.

    It could be < 0, because the view show the last item and begin to show the first one automatically(swipable==false).

    Please check before handling event.

    Specified by:
    onItemScroll in interface LLSlideView.OnItemScrollListener
    Parameters:
    _location - the position of current item.
    _bitmaps - the downloaded bitmaps
